nodes.text: Gar-Oth's Empire was a region controlled by the Yahk-Tosh warlord Gar-Oth. Gar-Oth had been prospecting for an easy world to conquer and add to his empire and in 31 BBY, he selected a small planetoid ruled by an monarchy of elfish humanoids. Gar-Oth invaded the world, murdering its king, and in order to gain legitimacy in the eyes of the world's residents, tried to force the king's daughter Princess Lourdes to marry him. His plan was thwarted, however, by the princess and the Jedi Knight Yoshi Raph-Elan, leading to his death.
